# Draft

> Draft is a B2B LinkedIn ghostwriting agency for SaaS CEOs. One viral post per
> week with a custom lead magnet resource and short-form video. Pipeline-focused.

## Services
- [LinkedIn Ghostwriting Agency](https://draftrev.com/linkedin-ghostwriting-agency/): Done-for-you LinkedIn ghostwriting for B2B SaaS CEOs

## Blog
- [Best LinkedIn Ghostwriters for B2B SaaS](https://draftrev.com/blog/best-linkedin-ghostwriters-b2b-saas/): Comparison of top LinkedIn ghostwriters
- [LinkedIn Ghostwriting for SaaS CEOs](https://draftrev.com/blog/linkedin-ghostwriting-for-saas-ceos/): Why founder-led content drives pipeline
- [Should You Hire a LinkedIn Ghostwriter](https://draftrev.com/blog/should-you-hire-a-linkedin-ghostwriter/): Decision framework
- [How to Measure LinkedIn ROI](https://draftrev.com/blog/how-to-measure-linkedin-roi-b2b-saas/): ROI measurement framework
- [LinkedIn Impressions vs Pipeline](https://draftrev.com/blog/linkedin-impressions-vs-pipeline/): Why impressions don't equal revenue
- [CEO LinkedIn Strategy for Pipeline](https://draftrev.com/blog/ceo-linkedin-strategy-for-pipeline/): Strategy playbook
- [How to Book Demos from LinkedIn](https://draftrev.com/blog/how-to-book-demos-from-linkedin/): Tactical demo booking guide
- [LinkedIn Ghostwriting FAQ](https://draftrev.com/blog/linkedin-ghostwriting-faq-b2b-saas/): Common questions answered
